ruleResults.name: Prevent containers from accessing underlying host
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Invalid key `hostPath` - refrain from using this mount to prevent an attack on the underlying host

ruleResults.name: Ensure Deployment has more than one replica configured
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `replicas` - running 2 or more replicas will increase the availability of the service

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a configured memory request
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing property object `requests.memory` - value should be within the accepted boundaries recommended by the organization

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a configured liveness probe
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing property object `livenessProbe` - add a properly configured livenessProbe to catch possible deadlocks

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a configured readiness probe
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing property object `readinessProbe` - add a properly configured readinessProbe to notify kubelet your Pods are ready for traffic

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a configured memory limit
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing property object `limits.memory` - value should be within the accepted boundaries recommended by the organization
